boardgame.name: Legendary: Buffy The Vampire Slayer
boardgame.description: Legendary: Buffy The Vampire Slayer is the newest addition to the Legendary series. In Legendary, a semi-cooperative deck-building game, 1 to 5 players use fan-favorite characters including Buffy, Angel, Willow, and Giles and attempt to stop a Big Bad and their nefarious Schemes. Players win the game if the Big Bad is beaten four times, and lose if the Big Bad is able to complete their Scheme._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Based on the popular TV series only, Legendary: Buffy the Vampire Slayer features a light/dark track that influences characters' strength, which is meant to boost the thematic feeling._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This 500 card core set includes:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;15 Heroes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Big Bads_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;7 Villain Groups_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Henchmen Villain Groups_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;8 Schemes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;40 Watchers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;20 Initiative Soldiers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;15 Potential Slayers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;30 Bystanders_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;30 Wounds_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;11 Scheme Twists_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Master Strikes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;also includes 60 Dividers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: You can buy this game for 54.14€ (pay cash or by bank on our website and apply the discount code DISC005 in your shopping cart). New. Release date 15/11/17
